content.title: About Uptor
content.subtitle: Transforming education through technology
content.story: Uptor is revolutionizing online education by making high-quality learning accessible to everyone. Our platform combines cutting-edge technology with proven teaching methods.

content.title: Frequently Asked Questions
content.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Uptor's learning platform

items.question: How long do I have access to courses?
items.answer: Once enrolled, you get lifetime access to course materials, including all updates and new content added in the future.

items.question: Are certificates recognized?
items.answer: Yes, our certificates are industry-recognized and can be shared on LinkedIn, added to resumes, and verified by employers.

items.question: What if I'm not satisfied?
items.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your course, we'll refund your purchase.

items.question: Can I learn at my own pace?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our courses are self-paced, allowing you to learn anytime, anywhere, and fit your education around your schedule.

items.question: Do you offer corporate plans?
items.answer: Yes, we provide customized corporate training solutions with volume discounts for teams and organizations.
